title: Strengthening Clinical Practice Competencies: Project-Based Activity Design for Improving Student Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic reading/writing skills and experience using digital devices
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply the literacy activity design process step-by-step using the ADDIE model.
Learners can measure literacy improvement effects through project deliverables (reading activity reports, creative writing works).
Learners can establish a literacy activity assessment system using digital tools in a large-group collaborative environment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
